name: Caniverse Digital Gold
description: Coinverse Digital Gold (CDG) is a blockchain-based digital asset designed as a long-term store of value within the Caniverse ecosystem. Built on Solana, CDG combines scarcity, sustainability, and usability by burning 83% of its supply while creating real-world utility across payments, liquidity support, and ecosystem incentives. It is more than a speculative token â€“ it is engineered to give users a secure digital equivalent of gold while participating in the Caniverse vision of blockchain for real-world impact.
